=== Contributions ===

 1. '''Bug reporting''' when i find issues in some application that I am using.
 2. '''IRC support''' on FreeNode, usually at <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=ubuntu|#ubuntu]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=ubuntu|#ubuntu-br]]</nowiki> or <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=vivaolinux|#vivaolinux]]</nowiki>
 3. '''Volunteer Support''' to friends who want to use Ubuntu on their computers.
 4. '''Translation''' with the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-l10n-pt-br|Ubuntu Brazilian Portuguese Translators Team]]</nowiki>, contributing to Ubuntu, Unity, Ubuntu Touch and some other projects in Launchpad.
 5. '''Facebook''', moderating the <nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/groups/ubuntulinuxbrasil/|Ubuntu Linux Brasil]]</nowiki> group, the biggest one of brazilian users on Facebook (~7000 members now).

=== Future Goals ===

As a guy interested in Linux Security I always dreamed to help with security patches and something related to the Ubuntu Security. I also have interest in Ubuntu packaging.
